revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab:
Your letter of the 26th inst., relating to the Internal Revenue case of F. Hogel and Brother, with the papers accompanying it, was received to-day. That firm proposes
to pay, as tax $400:00
assessed penalty 200:00
specific penalty 600:00
$1200:00,
The acceptance of this proposal is recommended by me.
I have the honor to be, &c. &c.
